rsvp_thanks: Thank you for your RSVP! Feel free to contact us if you have any questions!
rsvp_deadline: Please be sure to RSVP through this form by April 30, 2019 and feel free to reach out to Corey or Tori with any questions.
reception_details: Immediately following the ceremony will be a semiformal reception. Cocktail hour begins early in the evening followed by a plant-based Mexican-American meal. After that we have the dance floor until midnight!
sms_instruction: to receive a reminder or two to RSVP for our wedding along with any other relevant details for the big day! Don't worry, you're able to stop notifications at anytime.
